control.visible: Container.PlexContent(Artists) | Container.PlexContent(Albums) | Container.PlexContent(Songs) | Container.PlexContent(Photos) | Container.PlexContent(PhotoAlbums) | [Container.PlexContent(Channels) | [Container.PlexContent(Channel) + ListItem.Type(photo)]] | [Container.PlexContent(Channel) + !ListItem.Type(clip) + !ListItem.Type(episode)]
